Subject: DMCA Violations

MIME element (text/plain) 
DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT 
1. The Smitrem.exe tool hosted on the site listed 
below is infringing upon my copyrighted material. This 
program has been written by me and hosted without my 
permission. 
http://www.geekstogo.com/  
http://noahdfear.geekstogo.com/  
http://noahdfear.geekstogo.com/click%20counter/click.php?id=1 
   
   
2.The smitrem program listed above use a utility 
called getsts.exe and pv.exe which belongs to me. I am 
the author of both of those programs and the website 
has No permission to use them. References to my 
programs can be found here. 
http://noahdfear.geekstogo.com/click%20counter/click.php?id=1 
 If this file is downloaded and unzipped you will see 
it includes both of my programs. 
3. The hard copy of my copyright and trademark is 
stored at my location in California. 
4.I can be reached at the following email address 
fivecornersme@yahoo.com  
5. I have a good faith belief that use of the 
copyrighted materials described above on the 
infringing web pages is not authorized by my 
registered copyright and by the law. I swear, under 
penalty of perjury, that the information in the 
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright 
owner of an exclusive right that is infringed. 
 
 
Sharon Davies 
President and CEO 
Service Master tools inc
